description:
CompTIA A+ 220-901 and 220-902 Complete Video Course is a unique video product that provides complete coverage of all CompTIA A+ objectives so you can study for and pass the exams. The training provided in this course, which includes the CompTIA A+ 220-901 and CompTIA 220-902 Complete Video Courses, provides targeted and concise training that walks you through a learning path to successfully understand and absorb all key exam concepts.

The modules in this course cover every objective in the CompTIA A+ 220-901 and 220-902 exams and can be used as your resource for learning the material needed to study for and pass both A+ exams.

Nine modules map to the main objectives of the CompTIA A+ 220-901 and 220-902 certifications. The video lessons are broken down into modules and cover the following topics: 

* Hardware 

* Networking

* Mobile Devices

* Troubleshooting 

* Windows Operating Systems

* Other Operating Systems and Technologies 

* Security 

* Software Troubleshooting

* Operational Procedures
title: CompTIA A+ Certification 220-901 & 220-902 Full Course
